text: carl_grimes Do n't look so worried .
lori_grimes It 's my job .
carl_grimes No , it 's not . You 're a housewife .
lori_grimes Yeah , punk ? You see my house around here ? A housewife .
carl_grimes They do n't have a mother .
lori_grimes She might be somewhere else .
carl_grimes Maybe she got eaten . Everything is food for something else .
maggie_greene Could you be more obvious ? Here , enjoy .
glenn_rhee Are you trying to buy my silence with fruit ?
maggie_greene Of course not . There 's also jerky .
glenn_rhee Will you please tell me why your dad has a secret barn full of walkers ? It 's creepy .
maggie_greene Shh .
glenn_rhee You know that , right ?
maggie_greene Shh . Just trust me on this , okay ?
glenn_rhee But I suck at lying . I ca n't even play poker . It 's too much like lying .
maggie_greene You have to keep this to yourself . You have to . Please .
glenn_rhee Dale , here 's some peaches for you .
dale_horvath Mm , thank you .
glenn_rhee Morning .
andrea_harrison Morning .
theodore_douglas ' Sup ?
glenn_rhee Nothing . Nothing 's up . Why ?
andrea_harrison Hey . This is not that great , but .
daryl_dixon What , no pictures ?
andrea_harrison I 'm so sorry . I feel like shit .
daryl_dixon Yeah , you and me both .
andrea_harrison I do n't expect you to forgive me , but if there 's anything I can do .
daryl_dixon You were trying to protect the group . We 're good . But hey , shoot me again , and you 'd best pray I 'm dead .
glenn_rhee What did rick say ? You did n't tell him ? Okay . But you have to . You 're pregnant . You need vitamins , medicine , a nice pillow . Here . You can have my share .
lori_grimes Honey , I do n't want your food , okay ? eat .

glenn_rhee You need to eat . You 're too skinny . And if you 're not gon na let rick take care of you , then someone has to . Lori , you have a medical condition . I 'll make another run into town . Just tell me what you need .
lori_grimes I need you to be quiet about this . All right ? Please .
shane_walsh Hey ! Peach man .
rick_grimes The creek flows south , past that farmhouse daryl found . Maybe Sophia dropped the doll there , the current brought it downstream .
shane_walsh So what , you think she took this road here and then she went north ?
rick_grimes Yeah . What 's up that way ?
jimmy A housing development . It went in maybe 10 years ago .
rick_grimes Take a run up there after gun practice . I 'll hold down the fort here , but take backup . After what went down with Daryl , I do n't want anyone going out alone . We stay in pairs .
shane_walsh I 'll take suggestions on a partner .
rick_grimes See how they do on the range , then take your pick . Thanks .
shane_walsh My binoculars .
glenn_rhee Yeah yeah . Okay , bye .
beth_greene We 'd like to join you for gun training today .
rick_grimes Hershel 's been very clear . I ca n't involve any of you in what we do without his okay .
beth_greene He does n't like it , but he consented .
patricia Otis was the only one who knew guns . Now that he 's gone , we got ta learn to protect ourselves . Her father saw the sense in that .
rick_grimes No offence , but I 'll ask hershel myself .
shane_walsh Dude , nice lid , man . What 's going on ?
carl_grimes I want to learn to shoot too . Can you teach me ?
shane_walsh Well , man , that's -- that 's up to your parents .
carl_grimes Can you talk to them ? They 'll listen to you .
shane_walsh We 'll see , okay ?
shane_walsh Hey . Let me see what you 've got there .
lori_grimes How the hell did this happen ?
dale_horvath Well , It 's my fault . I let him into the RV . He said he wanted a walkie , that you sent him for one .
lori_grimes So on top of everything else , he lied . What was he thinking ?
shane_walsh He wants to learn how to shoot . He asked me to teach him . Now It 's none of my business , but I 'm happy to do it . It 's your call .
lori_grimes I 'm not comfortable with it . Oh , do n't make me out to be the unreasonable one here . Rick ?
rick_grimes I know . I have my concerns too , but-- .
lori_grimes There 's no but . He was just shot . He 's just back on his feet and he wants a gun ?
rick_grimes Better than him being afraid of 'em . There are guns in camp for a reason . He should learn to handle them safely .
lori_grimes I do n't want my kid walking around with a gun .
rick_grimes But how can you defend that ? You ca n't let him go around without protection .

lori_grimes He is as safe as he 'll ever be right now . Look , everything you 're saying makes perfect sense . It feels wrong . I mean I did n't feel good about him following you out into the woods . And I wish I 'd said something . I should 've gone with my gut .
rick_grimes He 's growing up , thank god . We 've got to start treating him more like an adult .
lori_grimes Then he needs to act like one . He 's not mature enough to handle a gun .
carl_grimes I 'm not gon na play with it , mom . It 's not a toy . I 'm sorry I disappointed you , but I want to look for Sophia and I want to defend our camp . I ca n't do that without a gun .
rick_grimes Shane 's the best instructor I know . I 've seen him teach kids younger than carl .
lori_grimes You will take this seriously and you will behave responsibly . And if I hear from anyone in this camp that you 're not living up to our expectations-- .
rick_grimes They wo n't let you down .
carl_grimes Yeah .
rick_grimes Now if you 're gon na do this , you listen to shane .
carl_grimes Okay , dad .
rick_grimes All right ? You two be careful .
shane_walsh You coming ?
glenn_rhee I got ta help dale clean the spark plugs on the RV . He said he 's gon na teach me mechanics . I should probably go look for him .
dale_horvath You found me .
dale_horvath He 's a good learner .
dale_horvath Spark plugs , huh ? Want to tell me what 's going on ?
glenn_rhee You 're old . You're -- you know things . So . what if somebody told you something that somebody else should know-- ?
dale_horvath Glenn , stop being dramatic . Spit it out .
glenn_rhee There's -- there 's walkers in the barn and Lori 's pregnant .
theodore_douglas Hey , come on , man . Do n't give me that gangsta shit .
shane_walsh Good work . Do n't be discouraged . You 'll hit the target eventually .
andrea_harrison Who says I did n't hit my target ?
shane_walsh Try this one . It 's heavy . You get better balance , twice the rounds .
rick_grimes I 'd say she 's got the hang of it . I 'd say she 's ready for the advanced class . It might be worth your while after the rest of us head back to camp .
andrea_harrison Sure . Why not ?
shane_walsh How 's it feeling ?
andrea_harrison I like the weight . So you decided not to leave us . Something changed your mind ?
carl_grimes Got it .
rick_grimes That 's a great shot .
dale_horvath Nervous Nelly ? She find her way home ?
hershel_greene Found her in her stall this morning .
dale_horvath I love your fields . Took a long walk this morning . I ended up by the barn . I heard the moans .
hershel_greene That 's unfortunate .
dale_horvath I 'm sure you have your reasons for keeping this a secret .
hershel_greene I saw the broadcasts before they stopped , saw the irrational fear , the atrocities , like the incident at my well .
dale_horvath We put down a walker .
hershel_greene You killed a person .
dale_horvath Well , if you watched the same broadcasts I did , you saw walkers attack , kill . They 're dangerous .
hershel_greene A paranoid schizophrenic is dangerous too . We do n't shoot sick people .
dale_horvath With all due respect , you are cut off from the outside world here . But I 've see people that I cared about die and come back , and they 're not people .
hershel_greene My wife and stepson are in that barn . They 're people .
dale_horvath I 'm sorry . Let me help . I 'll speak to Rick . He 's a good man . We can make the barn more secure , keep everybody safe .
hershel_greene The barn is secure . Keep this to yourself if you want to help . rick is a man of conscience , but are you so sure about everyone in you group ?
lori_grimes Afternoon .
hershel_greene I take it your boy did well .
lori_grimes Not bad , actually .
hershel_greene Be grateful you do n't have a daughter . If only things were as simple as wanting to shoot .
lori_grimes Carl 's getting that chance , thanks to you . And I 'm eternally grateful for what you did and your hospitality . We 'll earn our keep .
hershel_greene I appreciate that , but with carl getting better , I imagine you 'll be moving on soon -- Fort Benning , I hear .
shane_walsh Still a virgin .
andrea_harrison The target 's too small .
shane_walsh Come on , that 's crap . Half an hour ago I saw you nail a bull 's eye at 25 ' feet .
andrea_harrison It was n't moving .

shane_walsh You think a walker 's gon na hold still for you ? Focus and reload , go again . Uh - oh , did I piss you off ? Come on , girl , you 've got walkers all around you . They 're the woods . They 're in the RV . You 're gon na need more than a damn screwdriver .
andrea_harrison Stop badgering me .
shane_walsh You 're too damn emotional . You need to shut it down . Take all that guilt , take that fear , that being pissed off , take it out .
andrea_harrison Right , 'cause you 're so calm .

shane_walsh See that ? See , I can be pissed off . I could be whistling """" Dixie """" and I 'll always hit the target . But you , god , you shoot like a damn girl . You stand here and you point your weapon . Point like you point your finger . Do not think about it . I 'm talking about muscle memory , girl -- muscle memory . Now go on , shoot that son of a bitch . He 's coming for you ! He 's 10 ' feet away ! He 's 9'--he 's 5 ' feet away ! Right there , that 's the walker that got Amy . Now you shoot that son of a bitch ! Shoot him !
lori_grimes hershel expects us to leave ? Does anybody else know ?
rick_grimes Not yet .
lori_grimes Were you gon na tell me ?
rick_grimes Of course .
lori_grimes When ? How long have you known ?
rick_grimes Not long . You do n't need to worry about this .
lori_grimes How can you expect me not to worry ? We have shelter here and food and water and medical care .
rick_grimes I 've been talking with Hershel . It 's not carved in stone .
lori_grimes He thinks it is . We have to fix this . People are settling in here . They 'll be devastated .
rick_grimes I know I 'm working on it .
lori_grimes Maybe I can talk to him too and plead our case .
rick_grimes No , things are uneasy . The best thing right now Is to give hershel some space . Do n't look at me like that .
lori_grimes Like what ?
rick_grimes Like you 're scared . Like you do n't trust me . I can take it from everyone else , but not from you .
lori_grimes I do n't understand how you could keep something like this from me . Carl 's barely on his feet . And Sophia 's missing . And daryl and t - dog are hurt . How can we leave ?
rick_grimes It 's not what I want either , but if we have to go , I 'll do whatever it takes to make sure you and carl are okay . We 'll get by . We will .
lori_grimes Okay .
shane_walsh Come on , let me give you a lift .
andrea_harrison My feet work just fine .
shane_walsh Look , I 'm just trying to get you rattled , give you an idea what it 's like when the shit starts to fly .
andrea_harrison Is that an apology ?
shane_walsh I crossed the line when I brought Amy into it . Yeah , it 's an apology .
andrea_harrison You 're a real dick sometimes .
shane_walsh Yeah , I acknowledge that . I 'll tell you what I 've got a lead on Sophia . I 'm gon na go check it out . Why do n't you come with me , be my backup ?
dale_horvath My wife was pregnant once . She miscarried and we did n't try again after that .
lori_grimes I 'm so sorry .

dale_horvath The thing that I remember most is how nauseated she became at the smell of cooking meat . And she was a meat - eating gal , my wife , but with the pregnancy -- that thanksgiving , the turkey -- she could n't be in the house for two days until it was aired out , poor thing .
lori_grimes glenn told you ?
dale_horvath What did you expect ? The boy has no guile .
lori_grimes I have n't told Rick . I ca n't .
dale_horvath Because of Shane ?
lori_grimes Was it that obvious ?
dale_horvath No no , I do n't think anyone knew . I did n't , not for sure .
lori_grimes Look , I thought my husband was dead . And I felt like I died with him . And I -- I wanted to feel something -- anything . And now I hate myself for it .
dale_horvath And the baby ?
lori_grimes It 's Rick 's . None of the rest of it matters .
dale_horvath Then what 's your concern ?

lori_grimes Memories are what keep me going now . Memories of what life used to be . And I -- I've got a deep well to draw on . I still remember joy . But I think Jackson and Carl 's well is already running dry . And this baby -- the baby wo n't have any good memories at all , only fear and pain .
dale_horvath You ca n't think like that . We can still find joy and we can still take strength from each other .
lori_grimes Do you really think this baby has a chance , that it could grow up and live a happy life ? Look me in the eye and tell me that my baby will grow up to be your age and die happy .
lori_grimes Tell me . Tell me you believe that .
glenn_rhee I 'm sorry . I'm -- it just came out . And it was dale .
lori_grimes It 's okay . I never should have put you in that position . I 've been thinking about what you said about needing help . And you 're right that I do .
glenn_rhee Name it . Yeah .
lori_grimes If you 're still willing to make a run into town for me .
glenn_rhee I 'm your man .
lori_grimes Thank you .
glenn_rhee It 's okay . It 's not a big deal really .
glenn_rhee You did n't have to come . You could hate me from a distance . Please say something . Maggie , I-- .
maggie_greene I asked for your trust and you betrayed it . Now my dad 's pissed at me . Your turn .
glenn_rhee So your dad thinks they 're sick ? You agree with that , even after what you saw at the well ?
maggie_greene I 'm not sure what I saw at the well .
glenn_rhee Yes , you are . Look , if you 'd seen Atlanta , you would not have a barn full of walkers .
maggie_greene I wish you 'd stop calling them that .
glenn_rhee What do you call them ?
maggie_greene Mom , Shawn , Mr. and Mrs. Fischer , Lacey , Duncan .
maggie_greene What does she want now ?
glenn_rhee I ca n't say .
maggie_greene So when one of them asks you to keep your mouth shut .
glenn_rhee Crawl out of my butt and help me look , please .
maggie_greene You 've got to be kidding me .
maggie_greene No ! No ! No ! Glenn !
glenn_rhee Maggie !
maggie_greene Glenn , help me ! Help ! Glenn ! Get it off me ! Help !
glenn_rhee Did it get you ? Did it bite you ?
maggie_greene glenn .
shane_walsh We 're gon na have to go house to house . We 'll start at the far end and we 'll work our way back .
andrea_harrison If Sophia got this far , she has a real shot , do n't you think ?
maggie_greene Hey ! We got your stuff .
glenn_rhee Maggie , hang on , please .
lori_grimes Come on in here .
maggie_greene Why ? Nothing to hide . We got your special delivery right here . We got your lotion , got your conditioner , your soap opera digest .
lori_grimes maggie .
maggie_greene Next time you want something , get it your damn self . We 're not your errand boys .
lori_grimes Honey , I-- .
maggie_greene And here 's your abortion pills .
glenn_rhee That was not cool .
maggie_greene Which part ? The part where that bitch almost got us killed ?
glenn_rhee I should 've gone alone . If you want to blame anybody , blame me .
maggie_greene Right , take the blame . You know , for a smart guy , you 're really stupid .
glenn_rhee Okay , I 'm confused , because I think you just paid me a compliment but you made it s-- .
maggie_greene I 've already lost three of the people that I care about most in this world .
glenn_rhee Maggie-- .

maggie_greene Shut up . You 're smart . You 're brave . You 're a leader . But you do n't know it . And your friends do n't want to know it . They 'd rather have you fetching peaches . There 's a dead guy in the well ? Send glenn down . You 're walker bait . I ca n't take you becoming one of them .
andrea_harrison Sophia ? Anyone ? Sophia ? They walled off the hallway ?
shane_walsh They tried to make a stand here .
andrea_harrison Sophia ?
andrea_harrison She was never here , was she ? I do n't know how to tell carol this was another dead end .
shane_walsh Come on , let 's move .
shane_walsh Cover that street . I 'll clear the car .
andrea_harrison Oh shit .
shane_walsh Focus now . Clear the jam . Focus .
andrea_harrison Are you kidding me ?
shane_walsh I got your back . Now go .
shane_walsh Andrea , Andrea , let 's go . Come on . Andrea , come on .
lori_grimes The blood on Maggie 's shirt-- .
glenn_rhee She was attacked .
lori_grimes Are you guys all right ? How bad was it ?
glenn_rhee It was pretty close .
lori_grimes I 'm so sorry . I should never have asked you to go .
glenn_rhee I offered .
lori_grimes I thought the town was safe , but if you had n't come back-- .
glenn_rhee But we did . I always do . The morning - after pills -- will they even work ?
lori_grimes I do n't know . And I do n't know if I want them to .
glenn_rhee Then I got these too , just in case .
lori_grimes Prenatal vitamins . That 's a hell of a choice .
glenn_rhee I 'm glad it 's not mine . Lori , we 're friends , are n't we ?
lori_grimes With everything we 've been through -- yeah .
glenn_rhee I ca n't tell you what to do . I could never tell you something like that . But your choice -- maybe you should n't make it alone .
shane_walsh Come on then . Get over here . Get over here .
carol_peletier Anything ?
shane_walsh Not today .
andrea_harrison I 'm so sorry . We 'll cover more ground tomorrow .
dale_horvath What happened out there ?
andrea_harrison Um , I-- .
shane_walsh The place was overrun .
andrea_harrison Yeah .
carol_peletier Let 's go get you clean up .
dale_horvath Shane , Shane , I was thinking , you 've got that nice new ride of yours , plenty of fuel , more than enough for you to get far from here .
shane_walsh What , you telling me to leave ?
dale_horvath I know you 've been planning to . Maybe now is a good time .
shane_walsh Is this about Andrea ?
dale_horvath I 'm looking out for the group .
shane_walsh You think the group would be better off without me , Dale ? Why do n't you tell that to rick or Lori ? Their boy would be dead if I had n't put my ass on the line .
dale_horvath And Otis 's . You 've been vague about that night , about what happened .
shane_walsh Otis died a hero .
dale_horvath So you 've said .
shane_walsh A little boy lived because of what went down that night . I think you ought to show some gratitude .
dale_horvath I was n't there .
shane_walsh No , man , you were n't .
dale_horvath But I was the time that you raised your gun on rick .
shane_walsh Come on . Jesus .
dale_horvath You had him in your sights and you held him there . I know what kind of man you are .
shane_walsh You think I 'd shoot Rick ? That is my best friend . That 's the man that I love . I love him like he 's my brother . You think that 's the kind of man I am ?
dale_horvath That 's right .

shane_walsh Well , maybe we ought to just think that through . Say I 'm the kind of man who 'd gun down his own best friend . What do you think I 'd do to some guy that I do n't even like when he starts throwing accusations my way ? What do you think ?
rick_grimes Is there something you need to tell me ?
lori_grimes We ca n't leave . I 'm pregnant .
rick_grimes Are you ?
lori_grimes I threw them up . You can yell if you want . You can scream if you have to , but talk to me .
rick_grimes How long have you known ?
lori_grimes Does it matter ?
rick_grimes Days ? Weeks ? And you did n't tell me ?
lori_grimes I 'm telling you now .
rick_grimes No . I found these . So glenn knows , right ? Instead of going to me , you sent him to get pills ?
lori_grimes I panicked . You tell me we have no roof and no walls-- .
rick_grimes Do not put this on me ! You tear into me for keeping secrets when you 're holding onto this ?
lori_grimes You want me to bring a baby into this ? To live a short , cruel life ?
rick_grimes How can you think like that ?
lori_grimes We ca n't even protect the sons we already have .
rick_grimes So this is the solution ?
lori_grimes Rick , I threw them up . I screwed up . I do n't know how we do this .
rick_grimes We can make it work .
lori_grimes How ? Tell me how .
rick_grimes We 'll figure it how . Should n't we try to figure it out ? You threw up the pills . You want this baby . I know you do .

lori_grimes Not like this . Not giving birth in a ditch . Not when it 's life will hang by a thread from the second it 's born . Not when every cry will put it , and Carl , and everyone we care about , in danger . That 's not right .
rick_grimes Not even giving it a chance is n't right either .
lori_grimes Maybe this is why I did n't want to tell you .
rick_grimes I still -- I still do n't understand why . You really think I 'd make you have a baby you do n't want ?
lori_grimes No , so that if I went through with it , it would be on my conscience and not yours .
rick_grimes Maybe that 's true , but I ca n't live like this anymore , Lori . We ca n't live like this . Is there anything else I should know about ?
lori_grimes shane and I.
rick_grimes I know . Of course I know . You thought I was dead . The world went to shit and you thought I was dead . Right ?
lori_grimes Yeah .
